original_text: While you travel, you must tell people about the kingdom of heaven. You must tell them that it has now become near.
korean_text: 가면서 전파하여 말하되 천국이 가까이 왔다 하고

sentences.original_text: you must tell people about the kingdom of heaven
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 사람들에게 하늘 나라에 대해 말해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: that it has now become near
